issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description: We currently ship the tests with the source code. This is nice to test the integrity of the installation, it is not needed for runtime though. In the case of conda, the overhead to turn them into a separate package is small.
fields.summary: [Python] Separate tests into its own conda package
